@@ -1,1 +92,96 @@If you want your node to receive multiple touches, set the handleMultiplePointers property to true. Each touch down or dragged touch will generate a separate call to the handleEvent method, you can distinguish each touch by its pointer property.

## Animating using actions
Flutter Sprites provides easy to use functions for animating nodes through actions. You can combine simple action blocks to create more complex animations.
